All figures are **annualized run-rates as of end-2025**, not full-year totals. This is an **operating-expense view** â€” it excludes capital investment (data-center buildout, GPU purchases, etc.), which OpenAI currently accesses via cloud contracts rather than owning outright. Large one-off training runs are treated as annualized steady-state spending; in practice they are lumpy and might more properly be amortized over the useful life of the resulting model.
